Question
========

Suppose you live in a city where 125,000 households have a telephone and a research firm randomly selects 1,000 of these households for a telephone survey. What is then the probability that your household will be chosen?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/125
* 1/1000
* 1/124.000
* 1/125.000
* 1/126.000

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/125: Correct
* 1/1000: Incorrect
* 1/124,000: Incorrect
* 1/125,000: Incorrect
* 1/126,000: Incorrect
